Comments_List: A deeper understanding of the polish language and culture.

Try saying "W Szczebrzeszynie chrzszcz brzmi w trzcinie" five times fast and you'll see why Polish with Krystyna is the best and most stress-free learning environment for a new language- the class environment is light-hearted, easy-going, and the workload is low. And Krystyna is the most joyful person I've met in my life, and that joy spreads to others.

Further mastery of the Polish language, to the point where I think I would be able to make my way around and find food/shelter/transportation/assistance if I were suddenly dropped into a Polish city one day, which is cool.
I enjoy the small classes and direct teaching

Try saying "W Szczebrzeszynie chrzszcz brzmi w trzcinie" five times fast and you'll see why Polish with Krystyna is the best and most stress-free learning environment for a new language- the class environment is light-hearted, easy-going, and the workload is low. And Krystyna is the most joyful person I've met in my life, and that joy spreads to others.

Strengths: Collaborative classroom environment, clever and thoughtful homework assignments, emphasis on learning from rather than punishing mistakes, occasional polish-speaking guests invited to class, exposure to Polish history, culture, and media.

Weaknesses: None, in my opinion. A perfectly taught and structured Polish class.
Yes it is a great language class.

Try saying "W Szczebrzeszynie chrzszcz brzmi w trzcinie" five times fast and you'll see why Polish with Krystyna is the best and most stress-free learning environment for a new language- the class environment is light-hearted, easy-going, and the workload is low. And Krystyna is the most joyful person I've met in my life, and that joy spreads to others.
I 100% recommend this course to anyone who is looking for a fun and chill language course to take to meet their language requirement!
